name: UITextInputDelegate
desc: An intermediary between a document and the text input system.

items.name: func textWillChange(UITextInput?)
items.desc: Tells the input delegate when text is about to change in the document.

items.name: func textDidChange(UITextInput?)
items.desc: Tells the input delegate when text has changed in the document.

items.name: func selectionWillChange(UITextInput?)
items.desc: Tells the input delegate when the selection is about to change in the document.

items.name: func selectionDidChange(UITextInput?)
items.desc: Tells the input delegate when the selection has changed in the document.
